benchmark_details.name: P 2 P E VA L
benchmark_details.overview: P 2 P E VA L is a comprehensive benchmark featuring 121 paper-poster pairs and a dual evaluation methodology (Universal and Fine-Grained) that leverages LLM-as-a-Judge and detailed, human-annotated checklists for evaluating academic posters generated from research papers.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a robust evaluation framework for academic poster generation systems and to facilitate the assessment of their quality through a comprehensive benchmark.

data.source: 121 paper-poster pairs collected from the ACL conference series (2022-2024) and SciPostLayout.
data.annotation: Four annotators independently review each poster; checklists based on official posters are used for evaluation.

methodology.calculation: Scores are based on human annotations and automated evaluations.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate better preservation of content fidelity, visual consistency, and overall poster quality.
methodology.validation: Utilized XGBoost for modeling the relationship between evaluation criteria and human annotations.
